effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 208,442 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 113,559.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.
Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 208,442 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 113,559.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.
(2) Set: Enveloping Mist and Renewing Mist healing increased by 10%.
(4) Set: Vivify extends the duration of Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist on its primary target by 3.0 sec, up to 3.0 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,313 to 8,938 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 271 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Geargrinder's Spare Keys

spells.description: Use: Launch a Geargrinder trike to its final blaze of glory, exploding upon impacting the first enemy in its path to deal 1 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: I'm gonna step on the gas!

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
